title: Melody Drifting in the Rain - Novel Updates
tags: Adapted to Manhua   Ancient China   Female Protagonist
author: Cang Yue   沧月
description: After the death of the Emperor, the country of Li is plunged into civil war. In order to save his brother's forces from imminent defeat, Xueya, 7th prince of the realm, enters into a marriage with the feisty pirate princess Jin Bi Hui. Will her reinforcements arrive in time to turn the tide? Will this political marriage survive? What would Bi Hui do if she found out Xueya's heart belonged to another?>
